parameters.content:
## ‚ö†Ô∏è  Error Notification Workflow
This workflow handles errors across all automations:

üü¢ Manual runs (testing/tweaking) ‚Üí ‚ùå No alerts

üîÑ Automatic runs (schedule, webhook, etc.) ‚Üí üì© Slack alert sent to #tech-support

Slack message includes:

üìù Workflow name

üîó Execution link

üí• Error message

‚ú® Prevents spam during testing, while still surfacing real production issues.
